title: The Most Impeachable Offense | Guests: Rep. Meijer & Nina Shea | 8/27/21
description:
Glenn and Afghanistan war veteran Jason Buttrill join from the Middle East after watching President Biden’s speech after the Kabul bombings, and they’re not happy. Has Biden’s failure in Afghanistan made him a worse president than Woodrow Wilson? Bill O’Reilly joins to review Biden’s speech and the one piece of “good news” he believes has come out of all of this. Center for Religious Freedom director Nina Shea joins to discuss the truth about life under Taliban rule and the latest State Department drama. Glenn refutes internet rumors about him and the Nazarene Fund. Rep. Peter Meijer joins to discuss what he saw during his trip to Kabul and explain how he believes we should have withdrawn.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
